xdi2.core.security.digest.create

Class SHABasicDigestCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.security.digest.create.AbstractDigestCreator<SHADigest>
      • xdi2.core.security.digest.create.AbstractSHADigestCreator
        • xdi2.core.security.digest.create.SHABasicDigestCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DigestCreator<SHADigest>, SHADigestCreator

    public class SHABasicDigestCreator
extends AbstractSHADigestCreator
implements SHADigestCreator
    This is a SHADigestCreator that can create a SHADigest in a standard way.
